string-array.name: description_of_the_palce
string-array.item: The Victoria Memorial is a large marble building,which is considered to be the pride of Kolkata. Built between 1906 and 1921, it is dedicated to the memory of Queen Victoria. Now, it is a museum and a popular tourist spot under the Ministry of Culture.

Located over the Hooghly river in West Bengal, Howrah Bridge or the Rabindra Setu is the main connection between Howrah and Kolkata. It is a cantilever bridge and is regarded as one of the busiest ones among them.

Belur Mutt is the headquarters of the Ramakrishna Math and Mission, founded by Swami Vivekananda, the chief disciple of Ramakrishna Paramahamsa. It is situated on the west bank of Hooghly River, Belur, West Bengal, India. It is one of the noteworthy establishments in Kolkata. This temple is the focus of the Ramakrishna Movement. The temple is prominent for its architecture that embraces Hindu, Christian and Islamic styles and stands as an icon of unity of all religions.

The Eden Gardens is a Cricket and Football multipurpose ground in Kolkata, India. It was established in 1864. It is the oldest cricket stadium in India. It will be the home ground of Eastbengal FC in ISL season 7 2020-21.
Dakshineswar Kali Temple is a Hindu navaratna temple located at Dakshineswar. Situated on the eastern bank of the Hooghly River, the presiding deity of the temple is Bhavatarini, an aspect of Kali.

string-array.name: description_of_the_hotel
string-array.item: Experience a relaxing getaway situated 8 Kms from the Kolkata Airport, The Westin Kolkata Rajarhat is in close proximity to the International Convention Centre, Eco Park and the Business hub of Salt Lake & Rajarhat. With the stunning Kolkata cityscape in the background, guests checking in to the hotel have a choice to be pampered with an invigorating massage at the Heavenly Spa by Westin, indulge in Westin WORKOUT facilities or simply take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool in this calming oasis. The hotel showcases 304

Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Kolkata (Calcutta) does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Pride Plaza Hotel Kolkata, a nice option for travellers like you. Youu will enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning, and you can stay connected during your stay as Pride Plaza Hotel Kolkata offers guests free internet access. The hotel features a concierge, room service, and 24 hour check-in. Plus, Pride Plaza Hotel Kolkata.

Asia\'s first luxury hotel, The Lalit Great Eastern is a heritage landmark located in the main business and shopping district of Kolkata. Restored and renovated over a period of seven years, the hotel holds the distinction of being the longest continuously operating hotel for 165 years. Built in 1841 as Auckland Hotel, it has been referred to as the \'Jewel of the East\' and the \'Best Hotel East of the Suez\'. Over the years, the hotel has been the favourite haunt of royalty and celebrities from across the world.

Welcome to JW Marriott Kolkata - a landmark of luxury in the east of India and a top choice among 5-star hotels in Kolkata. Towering over JBS Haldane Avenue just 6km from Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose Airport, our hotel is equidistant from the airport and the old central business district. JW Marriott Kolkata boasts 281 spacious rooms with state-of-the-art facilities. We are a premier choice among hotels in Kolkata due to our passion for personal service and our exemplary dining options. At JW Marriott Kolkata, guests enjoy a convenient location, impeccable restaurants, luxurious rooms and suites, and large event spaces that are suitable for corporate events, weddings, and other functions. Our hotel also provides a beautiful infinity pool, a fitness club, and a holistic Spa by JW.

Hyatt Regency Kolkata is a luxury business hotel in Kolkata (or “Calcutta”), India. The hotel creates the feel of a private cocoon away from the complexities of modern living without giving up any of its luxuries. Hyatt Regency Kolkata is located next to Salt Lake Stadium & 15 mins drive from IT hub and is a preferred business destination of East India. A tranquil retreat amid spectacular landscaped gardens, featuring 234 luxury guest rooms and suites, the hotel allows guests to relax and rejuvenate while staying in Kolkata.

string-array.name: description_of_the_mall
string-array.item:
The number of luxury stores such as Gucci, Armani, Burberry, 
Rolex and many others is a big attraction for shoppers of this mall. 
Other than this, there are various other clothing stores 
as well where you can shop at a much affordable price.

At South City Mall, you can find almost all the famous regular brands 
which include Guess, Jack and Jones, Lacoste, Vero Moda, and many more. 
Stores like Shoppers Stop and Pantaloons can be seen in this mall 
where you can find the number of brands. Timezone, a gaming zone 
for hours of entertainment can also be spotted here for unlimited fun.

This is one of the most famous malls in Kolkata where shoppers of all ages 
would love to spend a number of hours. This is a huge mall divided into different 
sections which include, a shopping plaza, an entertainment zone, 
food court, cineplex, and different other 240 stores.

Another fine destination for shoppers, Mani Square offers almost everything 
you want to see while exploring a market. Whether it is about clothing, 
gaming or eateries, the place has it all for the visitors. 
Famous brands like Adidas, Levi’s, Raymond’s, Tissot, and much more, 
attracts the attention of many visitors throughout the day.

If you are in this city and want to explore different malls in Kolkata, 
then Acropolis Mall should be on your list of must-visit malls. 
The luxurious ambiance of the mall raised many eyebrows of first-time visitors. 
This mall has 5 floors where you can find all the popular brands to fill the shopping bags. 
The large food court and fine ding is another popular area you will see while taking a break from shopping.
